mokada salu wena samahara ayata thamange wayasa amathaka wenawa, thamange nonawa amathaka wenawa, wena wena nonalata udaw padaw karanna yanawa, onna oya nisa thamanta thamanwa palanaya karaganna bari aya, koktel sada walata nogihin sitima thamange sharira saukhyayata menma thaman wiwahakayeknam thamange pawul jiwithaye saukhyayatath hondayi.
hamudurugollanta nosalaka sitima mama hariyi kiyanne na.

manushshayek widiyata age karanna boho de ohu langa thibuna.

(siyalu amanapakam amathaka kara) samawa dima, (waradi niwaradi kara ganima hewath) manassthapanaya, ekinekawa suhuda sithin piliganima, (aaharapana yanadiya) bedaganima, (ekama aaharapana anubhawa karamin) ekamuthu sahodarathwayakin hasirima, ganudenu kirima magin anu aya samaga sambandhatha thahawuru kara ganima, punya kalaya thula thama aagamika wathawath wala yedima wani jathika sirith wirith subharanchiya thula kiyawena kristhu watinakam wethi.

‘sekkuwa’ yanu 1970 aga bhagaye bihi wu wedika natya atharin adatath rasikayange mathakayen gilihi nogiya natyayakayi kiwoth kisiwaku erehi nowanu atha. 1976 rajya natya uleledi hondama swathanthra natya rachanayata parakrama nirialla da, hondama sangitha nirmanayata samsan silwa da, hondama anga rachanaya saha andum nirmanayata hinatigala premadasa da, wishishta rangapam kusalatha sandaha gamini chandra kirthi hettiaarachchi da, rangapam kusalatha sandaha sanat dikkumbaura saha lintan semage da sammana himikara dun sekkuwe githa thawamath riyaliti wedikawala pawa asannata labima eyata hondama sakshiyayi.

prekshaka obage hadawatha sparsha karamin apurwa nirmanayan dawasin dawasa gena ena hiru mega stars maha supiri tharu sangramaye pasugiya senasurada rathriya babalawamin dewana awasan purwa tharanga wataye tharanga kala kandayam deka wuye shakyans saha mayans kandayam dwithwayayi.supurudu paridi me tharangayedith kandayam dekehi dakshatha ha nirmana adhikshanaya kirimata gaurawaniya winishchaya mandalaya lesa ek wuye shri lankiya sinamawe jiwamana rangana paurushaya prawina ranganawedi rawindra randeniya, hela sinamawe surupiniyak menma aakarshaniya charithayak wana sabitha perera, narthanayen ha ranganayen samage hada banda gath dilhani eekanayaka samagin aaradhitha winisuru asuna himiwu prawina sangithawedi ranga dasanayaka.prekshaka sama aadarayen ha unusumin piliganimin mema dewana awasan purwa tharangawaliye thiranathmaka sadhakaya wu kasiye wasiya uraga baluwe edina tharanga wadunu "mayans" kandayame nayikawa semini iddamalgoda ha "shakyans" kandayame nayikawa nilmini thennakon wisin wana athara kasiye wasiya thama kandayama wethata harawa gannata samath wuye "shakyayans" kandayamayi.kandayam dekehima karata kara tharangayakin narthanawaraya tharagawataye depilama lakunu 33 bagin saha gayanawaraya yana swayanwaraya saha

lambaa + udara = (purwa swara lopayen) lambaudara = (‘wa’ adeshayen) lambauwara = (‘wa’ lopayen) lambau + ara = (u + a dekata ‘oo’ wa) lambaora 1.sandhya dhikaraya                                       171 ‘a + i’ dekata ‘e’ wima ya ‘a +u’ dekata ‘o’ wima ya ‘u + a’ dekata ‘oo’ wima ya yi thunek mehi dakwina.
